# opencti Provider

This is a terraform provider plugin for managing [OpenCTI](https://github.com/OpenCTI-Platform/opencti) resources.

## Resources

The following resources can be managed using the provider:

- Case templates
- Groups
- Marking definitions
- Roles
- Status templates
- Task templates
- Users
- Vocabularies

## Example Provider Configuration

```terraform
provider "opencti" {
  url   = "http://localhost:8080"
  token = var.opencti_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `token` (String, Sensitive)
- `url` (String)
